research_question: Can AI be used effectively in screening papers for systematic reviews?
inclusion_criteria:
1. Include only papers that focus paper needs to be primarily about the screening phase
2. Include papers that use AI tools in systematic or literature reviews 
3. Include papers from 1 January 2024 to current date
4. Include only papers focused on Biomedical domain
exclusion_criteria:
1. Exclude preprints or non peer-reviewed papers
2. Exclude papers which focus on the use of AI for uses other than screening papers in systematic reviews
